#summary Richardson Maturity Model (Level 0 to Level 3)

= Richardson Maturity Model (RMM) =
 * Level 0
   * SOAP, XML RPC, POX 
   * Single URI
 * Level 1
   * URI Tunnelling 
   * Many URIs, Single verb
 * Level 2
   * Many URIs, many verbs 
   * CRUD services (e.g. Amazon S3)
 * Level 3
   * Level 2 + Hypermedia
   * RESTful Services

References: 
  * Jim Webber Presentation 2009 (Pg 4) [http://jim.webber.name/downloads/presentations/2009-05-HATEOAS.pdf http://www.gstatic.com/codesite/ph/images/tearoff_icon.gif]
